import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import {loadFirebase} from '../lib/db.js'; export default class addJob extends React.Component { constructor(){ super(); this.initial_state = { user_fname : '', user_sname : '', user_bd:'', user_NRC:'', user_email:'', user_pass:'', user_address:'' }; this.state = this.initial_state; } handleChange = (event) =>{ this.setState({[event.target.name] : event.target.value}); } addJob = event => { event.preventDefault(); let firebase = loadFirebase() const userRef = firebase.firestore().collection('user').add({ user_fname :this.state.user_fname, user_sname :this.state.user_sname, user_bd:this.state.user_bd, user_NRC:this.state.user_NRC, user_email:this.state.user_email, user_pass:this.state.user_pass, user_address:this.state.user_address }); this.setState({ user_fname : '', user_sname : '', user_bd:'', user_NRC:'', user_email:'', user_pass:'', user_address:'' }); }; render(){ return(
